This tool can calculate the jumping height for a given [[Jump Boost]] level.

<onlyinclude>{|- class="wikitable calculator-container calculatorgadget-enabled" style="display: none; {{{style|}}}"
! colspan=2 | Jump Boost
|-
| Level || {{Simplecalc|type=range|min=0|max=256|step=1|id=l|formula=l2|default=1}} {{Simplecalc|type=number|min=0|max=256|step=1|id=l2|formula=l|default=1}}
|-
| Jump height || {{Simplecalc|type=plain|decimals=2|formula=3.92*log(5*l/196+31/28)/log(0.98)+5*l+21|default=1.83}}
|}</onlyinclude>
